pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions to Access Premier Hockey Federation and National Hockey League Play by Play Data // A utility to scrape and load play- by-play data and statistics from the Premier Hockey Federation (PHF) https://www.premierhockeyfederation.com/, formerly known as the National Women's Hockey League (NWHL). Additionally, allows access to the National Hockey League's stats API https://www.nhl.com/.
